metadata.title: CVE-2022-25647 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: The package com.google.code.gson:gson before 2.8.9 are vulnerable to Deserialization of Untrusted Data via the writeReplace() method in internal classes, which may lead to DoS attacks.

criterions.comment: libgoogle-gson-java package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
